name: Gaya's Last Hope! (FUNDRAISER!)
description: This is a rpg game I have been working on for a little while, it includes boss battles, random appearance fights, ability to customize armor and weapons, many different classes and much more! THIS GAME IS A FUNDRAISER for my other project freshman year! As I am a solo developer, I can't spend lots of money on texture packs, animations, renders, etc. without your help! Please help me with the cost! This game will be updated regularly as well with new levels, quests, etc.
